## Maintenance Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task (e.g. dependency update, code refactor, cleanup).

## Scope
What parts of the project does this maintenance affect? (e.g. "auth module", "all test files", "dependencies")

## Expected Outcome
What will be the result of completing this maintenance?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, links, or notes about the maintenance task here.
